name: SpaceFacts
0:
”Alexa, Open Space Facts”
”Tell me a fact about Space.”
”Tell me a Space fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space facts
des: In-depth information and interesting quick facts about Space. This skill covers a range of space facts suitable for educating children and adults alike to the wonders of space and our solar system.
